title: Marks and Spencer 2019 beauty advent calendar unveiled and how to get first dibs
text:

When it comes to the beauty advents, both Marks and Spencer and Boots' No7 masterpieces sell out every year.

While Boots' got unveiled today - and is selling out in record time - M&S' offering goes on sale in eight days time, on Halloween .

Costing just £25 when you spend £40 or more in store, it's filled with a whopping £300 worth of luxurious make-up and skincare treats.

Available to buy both online on the M&S website or in stores from the 31st October, it's one of the most popular ways to countdown until Christmas.

And for good reason, packed full with 25 days of surprises, including plenty of bestsellers, and even six full-sized favourites.

We've got the full list of what's included below, with top picks including Emma Hardie, Aveda, This Works and Philip Kingsley.

(Image: ITV)

Talking about the launch, Marks and Spencer 's acting beauty editor Sam Dean said, "The heroes for me are PUR Mini Highlighter, Stila Liquid Lipgloss (one of three shades) and Autograph Kohl Pencil in black, all of which I’ll be using to help create endless festive party looks.

I’m also looking forward to an after-party relaxing ritual using the Emma Hardie Pink Clay Detox Mask. Be quick because these boxes fly off the shelves. Pick one up for your mum, your sister, your friend but most importantly bag yours first!"

What's inside the 2019 M&S beauty advent calendar?

(Image: ITV)
description: M&S' beauty advent calendar is renowned for its fancy products at a bargain price. And this year's is no different, containing over £300 worth of products for just £25
